alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued November 21 at 10:38AM PST until November 21 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING BELOW 1500 FEET... * WHAT...A period of stagnant air with light winds is expected. * WHERE...Cascade Foothills in Lane County and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Air stagnation could result in the development and persistence of poor air quality.
info.instruction: People with respiratory illness should follow their physician`s advice for dealing with high levels of air pollution during periods of stagnant air. State air quality agencies highly recommend that no outdoor burning occur and that residential wood burning devices be limited as much as possible. According to state air quality agencies, prolonged periods of stagnant air can hold pollutants close to the ground where people live and breathe. Check with your local burn agency for any current restrictions in your area.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County
